fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Energy, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Trans-European Networks, Transport
eu_initiatives:
Operational guidelines Ports of Refuge 
EU Recognised Organisations and Mutual Recognition

organisation_name: The Nordic Association of Marine Insurers (Cefor)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Nordic Association of Marine Insurers (Cefor) represents marine insurers in the Nordic countries. Our objective is to strengthen and develop the basic concepts of the Nordic marine insurance market and promote the members’ common interests in key issues for the marine insurance industry.
